welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Perry Heights, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Akron/canton Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Akron/canton Regional Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Akron/canton Regional Airport serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fulton International Airport is responsible for all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wayne County Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, duty-free shopping, and comfortable seating areas.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Wayne County Airport is dedicated to handling flights to and from countries outside of the United States. It features customs and immigration services for international travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Wayne County Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments, ensuring efficient and timely delivery.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
